Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oThis article is based on \u201cThe Computing Research Repository: Promoting the Rapid Dissemination of Computer Science Research\u201d, Joseph Y. Halpern and Carl Lagoze (http://xxx.lanl.gov/abs/cs.DL/9812020), but focuses on
somewhat different issues, more geared to the Computer Documentation community. It will appearin the ACM Journal of Computer Documentation\u00a7r
